SEARCH
Package photos.controller

Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
photos.controller.AlbumController
public class AlbumController extends Object
Controller associated with Album.fxml. Album.fxml is responsible for display of all photos in user album. It does so by formatting them as a manual slideshow. This class supports adding, deleting, and renaming albums, as well as navigating photo slides.
Author:
Harshi Oleti

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes Album.fxml. Loads all photos currently stored in the currently selected album and prepares the slideshow interface with next and previous buttons to help navigate.

    • quitApplication

      public void quitApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Saves data and cleanly quits the application.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the quitButton button

    • leaveAlbum

      public void leaveAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Navigates back to the home page and also saves the oldest and newest dates of the album.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the leave button.

    • deleteAlbum

      public void deleteAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Deletes the current album and returns to the home page.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the delete button.

    • uploadPhoto

      public void uploadPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Handles uploading a new photo to the album, support both new and previously existing photos via object reuse.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the add button

    • loadInOptions

      public void loadInOptions(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Loads the Options.fxml page for the selected photo, allowing tag and caption edits, along with photo deletion, photo copy/transfer, and so on and so forth. Will be elaborated on in the javadoc comments for OptionsController
      Parameters:
      e - is mouse click on any of the thumbnail pics in the slideshow

    • handleNext

      private void handleNext(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Shows next photo in album slideshow
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the nextButton button

    • handlePrev

      Shows previous photo in album slideshow.

      Navigates to the home page.

    • updateNavigationButtons

      private void updateNavigationButtons()
      Updates visibility of next/prev buttons based on slideshow position

    • renameAlbum

      public void renameAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Renames current album if new name doesn't already exist. Updates user model and current album reference.
      Parameters:
      e - is the triggering event from the renameButton
